瀙瀙瀙
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

瀙字的基本解释

瀙
qìn
〔瀙水〕今中国河南省沙河的古称。

瀙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qìn］
［《廣韻》七遴切，去震，清。］
［《廣韻》側詵切，平臻，莊。］
［《廣韻》初覲切，去震，初。］
水名。即今河南泌阳、遂平境内沙河。本为汝水支流之一；明嘉靖末西平、遂平间汝水断流，此后南汝遂以此为正源。

瀙字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　瀙； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页659第45
【唐韻】七吝切【集韻】七刃切，?親去聲。水名。【說文】水出南陽舞陽中陽山入潁。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?初覲切，音襯。又【廣韻】側詵切【集韻】咨詵切，?音臻。又【集韻】雌人切，音親。義?同。

瀙字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瀙字的起名意思

暂无。

Huang
Basic explanation of words
Huang
qìn
[Huangshui] The ancient name of Shahe, Henan Province, China today.
Huang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qìn］
["Guangyun" Seven Lining, Quzhen, Qing. ]
["Guangyun" side-cut, Pingzhen, Zhuang. ]
["Guangyun" at the beginning of the cut, to shake, at the beginning. ]
Water name. Now Shahe in Biyang and Suiping, Henan. This was one of the tributaries of Rushui; at the end of Jiajing in the Ming Dynasty, Rushui stopped flowing in Xiping and Suiping, and then Nanru took this as its source.
Huang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Shui Character Department] 　huang; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 659 45
[Tang Yun] Seven sting cut [Ji Yun] Seven blade cut, please go to the sound. Water name. [Said the text] Water flows out of Nanyang Wuyang Zhongyang Mountain into Ying.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? The beginning of the cut, the sound lined. And [Guang Yun] side 诜切 [Ji Yun] counseling 诜切,? Yin Zhen. [Jiyun] The female cuts, the sound is close. Righteous? Same.
Huang
